General.Name: 360 Security Technology Inc
General.Description: 360 Security Technology Inc., an internet security company, provides Internet and mobile security products in China. It offers 360 total security, 360 mobile security, 360 security browsers, and other national security products, as well as 360 enterprise security browsers for government and enterprise users. The company also provides security services, including security consulting, security operation and maintenance, and security training services to state agencies and enterprises; and hardware products, such as mobile phones, children's watches, smart cameras, driving recorders, and home firewalls. 360 Security Technology Inc. was founded in 1992 and is based in Beijing, China.
